_header: Mary so mild / For love of Thy child
Subjects: prayers, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, prayers to
_description: An orison to the Virgin Mary — eight short lines

BLHar1022.Transcription: Mary so mildeffor luf of þi shildehere þo wyldeþat praye þe nowGrace to vs hyldeWith blysse þu vs byldeiffro synne þu vs schildeAmen for our prowe
BLHar1022.Note: Fourth lines set out to right of previous three in each stanza.
